span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 破译： to read or interpret (ambiguous, obscure, or illegible matter).
【例】 we deciphered the hidden message to find out when we were supposed to meet 破解了暗语后，发现我们要碰头
【近】 break, crack, decrypt, decode
【反】 cipher, encipher, encode, encrypt 加密
【考法 2】 v. 理解，解读： to have a clear idea of
【例】 a convoluted复杂的 thriller小说, the plot of which I was never able to actually decipher
【近】 apprehend, perceive, recognize, seize, sense, make out
【记】 de反 + cipher加密→解密
【另】 encipher
